abstract.original_text: Public health structures in Germany re fl ect the federal system: health care in general lies within the responsibility of the 16 constituent states and the federal government only acts if a state asks for assistance. There were no bioterror-related intentional releases of biological agents in Germany

There were no bioterror-related intentional releases of biological agents in Germany
